title: Archive Digitale de Bella Sara
signup_create_desc: "Créer" créera un utilisateur avec le pseudo entré, tant qu'il reste des slots de save ouverts.
signup_import_desc: "Importer" permet d'importer les données de sauvegarde d'un autre utilisateur, vous permettant de jouer sur plusieurs navigateurs avec le même compte.
signup_delete_desc: "Supprimer" supprimera les données de sauvegarde de votre utilisateur actuel.
signup_export_desc: "Exporter" permet d'exporter les données de sauvegarde de l'utilisateur actuel, vous permettant de les importer sur un autre navigateur.
footer_maininfos:
Pour toutes questions, commentaires ou aide:
@Archiving sur le Discord Bella Sara ou ouvrez une discussions sur Notre Github
devlog_summary:
Here is the current state of the archiving of the Bella Sara website games:

We have successfully managed to locate and restore several of the original Flash games from the Bella Sara website thanks to archived pages and caches. These include Art Studio, Cloud Jumper, Treasure's Hunt, Jigsaw Puzzle, Coloring Game (Fiona only), Memory Game, Santo's Quiz, the Baby Bella ad, and the old version of the World Map.

Additionally, we have partially recovered or restored the files for several other games, such as Spectacular Jumping Game, Lance Riding, Storybook, My Horse (sprite only), Firelight Festival, Dreamrider, BubbleWand, and the newer version of the World Map. These games are still undergoing work to fully restore their original functionalities, and many games are missing files (e.g., the Lance Riding game is missing the files for the later levels).

We also found files for some other games, that we are trying on repairing to have them working again, such as Citrustacked, Wheel of Wonders, the newest version of CloudJumper, and Marvelous Magic Match

Unfortunately, some games remain missing or seem to be permanently broken (e.g., Bella's Beauty Box). To address this, we have started recreating a few of these games using the Phaser framework. As of this update, the Stables, the Spectacular Jumping Game, Yin and Yang's Memory Game and Belo's Quizare all available to play, although still as a work in progress. We are also currently working on recreating Bellapedia, which should hopefully be available soon.

Beyond restoring the original games, we have also started creating custom games inspired by the ones from the website. Currently, four are available: a Random Art Idea Generator, a Dress-Up Game based on the Stables, an Adventures Quiz and Autumn Journey Quiz based on Belo's Quiz. We are also considering of soon recreating Wheel of Wonders, Marvelous Magic Match, Bella's Beauty Box, and even a first prototype for Adventures.

We do hope to eventually restore or recreate all the games from the site if we can, but this will obviously take time. If you would like to help us out or would like a more detailed overview of this project, we would recommend starting here: Bella Sara Archival Notes. This project is a community effort and every little bit helps!
play_recoveredflashgames_desc: Des jeux archivés depuis le site d'origine
play_recreatedgames_desc: Des jeux qui ont été recréés avec un nouveau code
play_partiallyrecoveredgames_desc: Des jeux qui ont été archivés à partir du site d'origine, mais pour lesquels certains fichiers ou fonctionnalités de base sont manquants.
play_newgames_desc: De nouveaux jeux sur le thème ou inspirés de Bella Sara.
artstudio_warning: Ce jeu a les fichiers des chevaux originaux manquants.
babybella_warning: Ce jeu / pub semble manquer quelques unes de ses fonctionalités d'origine.
lanceriding_warning: Ce jeu ne contient que les fichiers du premier niveau. Il a aussi des problèmes pour se charger de manière consistante et la page peut avoir besoin d'être rechargée plusieurs fois avant que le niveau ne se lance.
storybook_warning: Ce jeu ne semble pas capable de se mettre en mode silencieux lorque l'on va sur la page suivante et ne joue pas toujours les vidéos comme attendu.
newmap_warning: Some links go to the wiki due to the games not being restored yet.
oldmap_warning: Some links are disabled due to the games not being restored yet.
belloquiz_warning: Due to the lack of references, this recreation may not be a 100% accurate.
bazaar_warning: Currently, the text is not yet working everywhere and you will need to right click the game and hit play to get past the loading screen. Objects are also not appearing.
firelight_warning: SEIZURE WARNING: The show portion of this game includes flashing lights! The game is quite laggy on certain browsers. You will need to right click the game and hit play to get past the loading screen.
citrustacked_warning: Some texts are not yet appearing correctly. The 'Continue' button doesn't always work correctly yet either.
jumpinggame_warning: The game can be quite laggy at times.
cottage_warning: The objects are not yet added back in the cottage or gallery. You will need to right click the game and hit play to get past the loading screen.
puzzle_goCustom: Click here to make a custom puzzle with your own image
puzzle_custom_warning: Note that images larger than 700 x 450 may be too large to see correctly.
puzzle_custom_warning2: Les images de taille supérieures à 700 x 450 ne seront peut-être pas entièrement visibles!

cloudjumper_timeline_information: Two slightly different versions of the game were saved from the official website. Here, you can choose which one you wish to play:
about_text:
The Neocities Bella Sara is an archival website made for saving, fixing and recreating the old Bella Sara flash games from the original website to prevent them from being fully lost to time.

This project is open to anyone who wish to help, and you can find out more here.
